name: ID3
desc: Iterative Dichotomiser 3, used to generate a decision tree from a dataset

parameters.name: x
parameters.desc: Independent variables: A list of categorical variables from database. It cannot be empty

parameters.name: y
parameters.desc: Dependent variable: A categorical variable from database. It cannot be empty

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.desc: It contains the names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed. It cannot be empty.

parameters.name: pathology
parameters.desc: The name of the pathology that the dataset belongs to.
